scripts.e: echo '*** Espruino command line:' && espruino --port COM6
scripts.e:flash:sandbox: echo '*** Espruino flash sandbox:' && espruino -j tooling/mcu/jobSandbox1.json --port COM6 mcu/src/projects/MCU.sandbox.js
